comments.raw_text:
I mentioned this to shorlander on IRC, his suggestion was that we should just use the OSX-like noise pattern (eg same filename, over in pinstripe). Wasn't sure if he meant literally, or if we should have Windows-specific noise. :)

Also, we should probably just move this to a common name/location in toolkit, since I think there are already 3 or 4 places we use/want this texture.
